name: ASSOCIATED ENERGY GROUP, LLC (AEG)
description: Offering aviation fuel and ground services.
sampleDescriptions: Notifying stakeholders, including congressional representatives, of actions by AEG in compliance with its DLA-awarded contract to supply fuel to DoD operations based in Djibouti.
